thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au
thread.title: Kylie Karvois.

author: Kylie Karvois.
title: Kylie Karvois.
text: From the moment I walked into Motorama Springwood, I was greeted with a friendly smile, I didn't have to wait long before I was seen to by Shanan Alexander, he remembered me from 2016. I let him know what I wanted and he started the ball rolling on the purchase of my new Mitsubishi ASX. Shanan explained everything that was going on, he is friendly and I would highly recommend him. I would highly recommend Motorama Springwood to everyone I know, great and friendly staff, nice layout, great coffee and tea facilities, they also have sandwiches and cakes for customers, a big plus to customers. Great work Shanan Alexander for getting my new Mitsubishi ASX, very happy with my new car.
